## 123. THAT (MEDIAL)
### Definition
A demonstrative used as a noun modifier that signifies location near the hearer. In three-way systems, a medial demonstratives. In two-way systems the distal demonstrative should be included here.

### Contexts
1. I am well acquainted with this tale, but do not remember that one. (GLD) 2. This knife is mine, that one is yours.
